name: Emoji Pinball Free - Emoticon Face Sniper & Arcade Table Machine
name_original: Emoji Pinball Free - Emoticon Face Sniper & Arcade Table Machine
description:
A new kind of pinball game, with Emoji Style!
Difficult and addictive!! Once you start, you can't stop!

- Slap the emoji ball
- Hit and crush the gems
- Can you get the high score?
